sense.def:
A restriction
je uradni ukaz, ki določa, kaj smemo narediti in česa ne ali kolikšna količina ali število nečesa je dovoljeno.

seg.quote: The government placed restrictions on sales of weapons.
There is no restriction on filming in the area.

sense.def:
A restriction
je vse, kar omejuje naše delovanje.

seg.quote: ...small salaries which placed restrictions on our social life.
